Class CudaFloatProvider

java.lang.Object
org.jscience.mathematics.vector.backends.CudaFloatProvider
public class CudaFloatProvider extends Object
Type-specific CUDA provider for single-precision (32-bit) matrices.

This provider works directly with primitive float arrays for maximum performance in GPU-intensive applications where double precision is not required.

When to Use Float vs Double

  • Float: Machine learning, graphics, simulations (2x faster)
  • Double: Scientific computing, financial (higher precision)
Since:
2.0
Author:
Silvere Martin-Michiellot, Gemini AI (Google DeepMind)

    • matrixMultiply

      public static float[] matrixMultiply(float[] a, float[] b, int m, int k, int n)
      Matrix-Matrix multiplication: C = A * B using cuBLAS SGEMM. All matrices in row-major order (flat arrays).
      Parameters:
      a - matrix A data (m x k)
      b - matrix B data (k x n)
      m - rows of A
      k - cols of A / rows of B
      n - cols of B
      Returns:
      result matrix C data (m x n)

    • matrixAdd
